org.jamwiki.servlets

Class ServletUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jamwiki.servlets.ServletUtil

  • public class ServletUtil
extends Object
    Utility methods useful when processing JAMWiki servlet requests.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String PARAMETER_PAGE_INFO
      The name of the output parameter used to store page information.
      static String PARAMETER_TOPIC_OBJECT
      The name of the output parameter used to store topic information.
      protected static String SPRING_REDIRECT_PREFIX
      The name of the output parameter used to indicate that Spring should redirect to another servlet.

    • Method Detail

      • buildVirtualWikiLinks

        protected static void buildVirtualWikiLinks(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                            WikiPageInfo pageInfo)
                                     throws DataAccessException
        Populate the virtualWikiLinks field of the pageInfo object for Special: pages.
        Throws:
        DataAccessException

      • cachedContent

        protected static String cachedContent(String context,
                                      Locale locale,
                                      String virtualWiki,
                                      String topicName,
                                      boolean cook)
                               throws DataAccessException
        Retrieve the content of a topic from the cache, or if it is not yet in the cache then add it to the cache.
        Parameters:
        context - The servlet context for the topic being retrieved. May be null if the cook parameter is set to false.
        locale - The locale for the topic being retrieved. May be null if the cook parameter is set to false.
        virtualWiki - The virtual wiki for the topic being retrieved.
        topicName - The name of the topic being retrieved.
        cook - A parameter indicating whether or not the content should be parsed before it is added to the cache. Stylesheet content (CSS) is not parsed, but most other content is parsed.
        Returns:
        The parsed or unparsed (depending on the cook parameter) topic content.
        Throws:
        DataAccessException

      • checkForSpam

        protected static String checkForSpam(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                     String identifier,
                                     String... args)
                              throws DataAccessException
        This is a utility method that will check topic content for spam, and return null if no matching values are found, or if a spam pattern is found then that pattern will be returned. It will also log information about the offending spam and user to the logs.
        Parameters:
        request - The current servlet request.
        identifier - An identifier used in logging to specify where spam was found.
        args - Any number of strings that should be validated againts the blacklist to see if they contain spam.
        Returns:
        null if nothing in the topic content matches a current spam pattern, or the text that matches a spam pattern if one is found.
        Throws:
        DataAccessException

      • currentUserDetails

        public static WikiUserDetailsImpl currentUserDetails()
                                              throws org.springframework.security.authentication.AuthenticationCredentialsNotFoundException
        Retrieve the current WikiUserDetailsImpl from Spring Security SecurityContextHolder. If the current user is not logged-in then this method will return an empty WikiUserDetailsImpl object.
        Returns:
        The current logged-in WikiUserDetailsImpl, or an empty WikiUserDetailsImpl if there is no user currently logged in. This method will never return null.
        Throws:
        org.springframework.security.authentication.AuthenticationCredentialsNotFoundException - If authentication credentials are unavailable.

      • currentWikiUser

        public static WikiUser currentWikiUser()
        Retrieve the current WikiUser using the WikiUserDetailsImpl from Spring Security SecurityContextHolder. If there is no current user (the user is not logged in) then this method will return an empty WikiUser. The method will never return null.
        Returns:
        The current logged-in WikiUser, or an empty WikiUser if there is no user currently logged in.

      • currentWatchlist

        public static Watchlist currentWatchlist(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                         String virtualWiki)
                                  throws WikiException
        Retrieve the current logged-in user's watchlist from the session. If there is no watchlist return an empty watchlist.
        Parameters:
        request - The servlet request object.
        virtualWiki - The virtual wiki for the watchlist being parsed.
        Returns:
        The current logged-in user's watchlist, or an empty watchlist if there is no watchlist in the session.
        Throws:
        WikiException - Thrown if any error occurs during processing.

      • getIpAddress

        public static String getIpAddress(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Duplicate the functionality of the request.getRemoteAddr() method, but for IPv6 addresses strip off any local interface information (anything following a "%").
        Parameters:
        request - the HTTP request object.
        Returns:
        The IP address that the request originated from, or 0.0.0.0 if the originating address cannot be determined.

      • initializeTopic

        protected static Topic initializeTopic(String virtualWiki,
                                       String topicName)
                                throws WikiException
        Initialize topic values for a Topic object. This method will check to see if a topic with the specified name exists, and if it does exist then that topic will be returned. Otherwise a new topic will be initialized, setting initial parameters such as topic name, virtual wiki, and topic type.
        Parameters:
        virtualWiki - The virtual wiki name for the topic being initialized.
        topicName - The name of the topic being initialized.
        Returns:
        A new topic object with basic fields initialized, or if a topic with the given name already exists then the pre-existing topic is returned.
        Throws:
        WikiException - Thrown if any error occurs while retrieving or initializing the topic object.

      • isEditable

        protected static boolean isEditable(String virtualWiki,
                                    String topicName,
                                    WikiUserDetailsImpl user)
                             throws WikiException
        Determine if a user has permission to edit a topic.
        Parameters:
        virtualWiki - The virtual wiki name for the topic in question.
        topicName - The name of the topic in question.
        user - The current Wiki user, or null if there is no current user.
        Returns:
        true if the user is allowed to edit the topic, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        WikiException - Thrown if any error occurs during processing.

      • isMoveable

        protected static boolean isMoveable(String virtualWiki,
                                    String topicName,
                                    WikiUserDetailsImpl user)
                             throws WikiException
        Determine if a user has permission to move a topic.
        Parameters:
        virtualWiki - The virtual wiki name for the topic in question.
        topicName - The name of the topic in question.
        user - The current Wiki user, or null if there is no current user.
        Returns:
        true if the user is allowed to move the topic, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        WikiException - Thrown if any error occurs during processing.

      • isTopic

        protected static boolean isTopic(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                 String value)
        Examine the request object, and see if the requested topic or page matches a given value.
        Parameters:
        request - The servlet request object.
        value - The value to match against the current topic or page name.
        Returns:
        true if the value matches the current topic or page name, false otherwise.

      • loadCategoryContent

        protected static void loadCategoryContent(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                          org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView next,
                                          String virtualWiki,
                                          String topicName)
                                   throws WikiException
        Utility method for adding categories associated with the current topic to the ModelAndView object. This method adds a hashmap of category names and sort keys to the session that can then be retrieved for display during rendering.
        Parameters:
        request - The current servlet request object.
        next - The current ModelAndView object used to return rendering information.
        virtualWiki - The virtual wiki name for the topic being rendered.
        topicName - The name of the topic that is being rendered.
        Throws:
        WikiException - Thrown if any error occurs during processing.

      • loadNamespaceDisplayMap

        protected static Map<Integer,String> loadNamespaceDisplayMap(String virtualWiki,
                                                             Locale locale)
                                                      throws DataAccessException
        Generate a map of key-value pairs consisting of a namespace ID and a display label, suitable for use in drop-downs or other namepsace selection tools on the front-end. This method will automatically filter out internal namespaces (ie those with ID < 0).
        Parameters:
        virtualWiki - The virtual wiki for the namespace map being retrieved.
        locale - The user's current locale, used to format a message key for the default namespace.
        Returns:
        A map of namespace ID - display value for use on the front end.
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - Thrown if an error occurs while retrieving namespace data.

      • loadPagination

        public static Pagination loadPagination(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                        org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView next)
        Create a Pagination object and load all necessary values into the request for processing by a JSP.
        Parameters:
        request - The servlet request object.
        next - A ModelAndView object corresponding to the page being constructed.
        Returns:
        A Pagination object constructed from parameters found in the request object.

      • processMultipartRequest

        public static List<org.apache.commons.fileupload.FileItem> processMultipartRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                                                            throws WikiException
        Utility method for parsing a multipart servlet request. This method returns a list of FileItem objects that corresponds to the request.
        Parameters:
        request - The servlet request containing the multipart request.
        Returns:
        Returns a list of FileItem objects the corresponds to the request.
        Throws:
        WikiException - Thrown if any problems occur while processing the request.

      • redirect

        protected static void redirect(org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView next,
                               String virtualWiki,
                               String destination)
                        throws WikiException
        Modify the current ModelAndView object to create a Spring redirect response, meaning that the view name becomes "redirect:" followed by the redirection target.
        Parameters:
        next - The current ModelAndView object, which will be reset by this method.
        virtualWiki - The virtual wiki name for the page being redirected to.
        destination - The topic or page name that is the redirection target. An example might be "Special:Login".
        Throws:
        WikiException - Thrown if any error occurs while processing.

      • retrieveUserLocale

        public static Locale retrieveUserLocale(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Users can specify a default locale in their preferences, so determine if the current user is logged-in and has chosen a locale. If not, use the default locale from the request object.
        Parameters:
        request - The request object for the HTTP request.
        Returns:
        Either the user's default locale (for logged-in users) or the locale specified in the request if no default locale is available.

      • retrieveVirtualWiki

        public static VirtualWiki retrieveVirtualWiki(String virtualWikiName)
        Given a virtual wiki name, return a VirtualWiki object. If there is no virtual wiki available with the given name then the default virtual wiki is returned.
        Parameters:
        virtualWikiName - The name of the virtual wiki that is being retrieved.
        Returns:
        A VirtualWiki object. If there is no virtual wiki available with the given name then the default virtual wiki is returned.

      • viewLogin

        protected static org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView viewLogin(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                        WikiPageInfo pageInfo,
                                                                        String topic,
                                                                        WikiMessage messageObject)
                                                                 throws WikiException
        Utility method used when redirecting to a login page.
        Parameters:
        request - The servlet request object.
        pageInfo - The current WikiPageInfo object, which contains information needed for rendering the final JSP page.
        topic - The topic to be redirected to. Valid examples are "Special:Admin", "StartingPoints", etc.
        messageObject - A WikiMessage object to be displayed on the login page.
        Returns:
        Returns a ModelAndView object corresponding to the login page display.
        Throws:
        WikiException - Thrown if any error occurs during processing.

      • viewTopic

        protected static void viewTopic(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView next,
                                WikiPageInfo pageInfo,
                                WikiMessage pageTitle,
                                Topic topic,
                                boolean sectionEdit,
                                boolean allowRedirect)
                         throws WikiException
        Utility method used when viewing a topic.
        Parameters:
        request - The current servlet request object.
        next - The current Spring ModelAndView object.
        pageInfo - The current WikiPageInfo object, which contains information needed for rendering the final JSP page.
        pageTitle - A WikiMessage for the title of the page being rendered. The first parameter of the message should be the topic name.
        topic - The Topic object for the topic being displayed.
        sectionEdit - Set to true if edit links should be displayed for each section of the topic.
        allowRedirect - Setting this parameter to true will force the redirection target to be displayed (rather than a redirect page) if the topic is a redirect.
        Throws:
        WikiException - Thrown if any error occurs while retrieving or parsing the topic.

      • viewTopicSource

        protected static void viewTopicSource(org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView next,
                                      WikiPageInfo pageInfo,
                                      Topic topic)
        Utility method used when viewing a topic's source. This functionality is primarily used when a user does not have permission to edit a topic or if a deleted topic version is being viewed.
        Parameters:
        next - The current Spring ModelAndView object.
        pageInfo - The current WikiPageInfo object, which contains information needed for rendering the final JSP page.
        topic - The topic being viewed.
